text:
Sirhan Bishara Sirhan (born March 19, 1944) is a Palestinian with Jordanian citizenship. He shot and killed U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy on June 6, 1968. He is serving his life sentence in Pleasant Valley State Prison in Coalinga, California. Sirhan was born on March 19, 1944 in Jerusalem, Mandatory Palestine.
On August 30, 2019, Sirhan was stabbed multiple times by another prisoner.
